roleset.name: to throw out
roleset.note: EJECT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'eject' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from eject.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: The personal antics of agency Director Amadou-Mahtar M'Bow [*ICH*-5] drew much attention , such as when [several of his top aides]-2 were uncovered [*-2] as KGB plants and ejected [*-2] from France [*T*-1] and when a mysterious office fire was set [*-12] just before Congress sent accountants [0] [*T*-4] to trace U.S. funds [*T*-3] .

example.name: All args
example.text: The umpire's ejection of the coach from the game angered the fans.
